item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Account_ProofOfConcept_Request_AccountFunded
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Account_ProofOfConcept_Request_AccountFunded Datatype Description Proof of concept request using the account team funding model. Note that proof of concept account request are available only to internal IBM employees. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Account_ProofOfConcept::requestAccount Local amount Dollar amount of funding requested for the proof of concept period Type: float costRecoveryRequest Billing codes for the department paying for the proof of concept account Type: SoftLayer_Container_Account_ProofOfConcept_Request_CostRecovery
